entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query contains non-consecutive table aliases when tables are pruned #32757
  • When using separate migrations assembly, the output path is not relative to target project #32752
  • EF Core 8 - Oracle - Ignore Case Sensitivity in Primary Key Column Leads to Incorrect Data Loading #32751
  • ISaveChangesInterceptor.SaveChangesFailed is not triggered by DbUpdateConcurrencyException #32750
  • AsSplitQuery not working with sort string.Join #32749

Closed

  • Make LinqToCSharpSyntaxTranslator more resilient to multiple declaration of the same variable in nested scopes #32716
    9.0.0
  • Short cut for Script-Migration the last migration #32744
  • SqliteTransaction.Dispose() leaves an orphaned transaction instance in the connection if RollbackInternal() throws #25119
    9.0.0
  • Left Join (GroupJoin-DefaultIfEmpty-SelectMany) will not be translated with ExpressionVisitor if no cache can hit #32742

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32759
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32758
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Change the return type of OwnedNavigationBuilder.PrimitiveCollection #32753
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #32755
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #32756
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #32754
  • Fix complex assignment operator handling in LinqToCSharpSyntaxTranslator #32715
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Cleanup when error occurs on dispose. #32605
  • Produce uncorrelated IN for Contains with nullable item #32575

Updated

  • Add --disable-build-servers to bundle command #32737
  • [release/8.0] Don't try to cast negative enum values to ulong #32731
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Don't detect join table with other incoming references as a simple join table #32729
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Generate change-tracking delegates in the compiled model. #31443
